elements.name: address
elements.title: What is your address?
elements.description: We will fill out some of the questions in this screener based on your address.

elements.name: ownHome
elements.title: Do you own your own home?
elements.description: Most of the programs are meant for home owners. Even if that isn't you, please fill out the form as we might be able to direct you to other resources.

elements.name: homeType
elements.title: Is it a single, duplex, or other multi-unit?
elements.description: Multi-unit homes may require approval by the owners of the other units.

elements.name: otherProperties
elements.title: Do you own any other properties?
elements.description: These programs are meant to support your primary residence.

elements.name: nameOnLease
elements.title: Is your name on the deed?
elements.description: If you are not on the deed, or if you aren't the only name on the deed, you will need permission from the owner.

elements.name: taxesUpToDate
elements.title: Are you up to date on your property taxes or on a payment plan?

elements.name: insurance
elements.title: Do you have home owner's insurance?

elements.name: weatherized
elements.title: Have you ever received weatherization or home repair assistance from any of these programs?
elements.description: County Corp, MVCAP, Rebuilding Together Dayton, or Habitat for Humanity?

elements.name: weatherized
elements.title: Has your home been weatherized by Miami Valley Community Action Partners program?

elements.name: centerpoint
elements.title: Do you have Centerpoint or Vectren as your natural gas provider?

elements.name: income
elements.title: What is your average household monthy income?
elements.description: This should include all permanent residents over the age of 18.

elements.name: familyMembers
elements.title: How many people in the home?

elements.name: age
elements.title: How old are you?
elements.description: Some programs are limited to seniors.

elements.name: preferredContact
elements.title: What is your preferred form of contact?
